pr.title: Discover: Replace bottom product cards with Figma Product Cards UI
pr.rollback: Revert PR. Restore AnimatedTestimonials + albumItems in DiscoveryPageClient; delete DiscoverProductCard.tsx and DiscoverCardStack.tsx.

receipt.goal: Replace bottom product cards on /discover with new Product Cards UI from Figma (Project Leaf - UI Components).
qa_steps: Open /discover, select age band, select a focus tile
Click a category or ensure examples show; verify bottom section shows card stack
Swipe or use Prev/Next; try Shuffle and Reset
Tap Save / Have / Visit and confirm behaviour (sign-in when needed, Visit opens URL)
receipt.rollback: Revert PR (no schema changes). Restore AnimatedTestimonials block; remove DiscoverProductCard.tsx, DiscoverCardStack.tsx.
